meanings.definition: A person who shares a mess or dining area with another.
meanings.sent1: My messmate and I always sit together during lunchtime.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy chatting with my messmate while we eat our meals.
meanings.sent3: My messmate accidentally spilled their drink on me during dinner!
meanings.sent4: In the bustling cafeteria, finding my messmate is like searching for a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: Having a reliable messmate makes meal times more enjoyable and less lonely.

meanings.sent1: My loyal messmate always has my back in tough times.
meanings.sent2: Walking home with my messmate is always a pleasant experience.
meanings.sent3: My messmate and I share a love for hiking in the great outdoors.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of strangers, finding a true messmate is like finding a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: A trustworthy messmate can make life's journey more fulfilling and meaningful.

meanings.definition: A member of the same group or organization.
meanings.sent1: As messmates in the club, we work together to achieve our goals.
meanings.sent2: Every messmate contributes something unique to our team.
meanings.sent3: My messmate and I always end up in the same study group by chance.
meanings.sent4: Being a messmate means being part of a supportive and united community.
meanings.sent5: United as messmates, we strive for success and growth together.
